file_content.text: Area secure. Another district the enemy won't be able to retreat to.
The turrets no longer pose a threat.
Excellent teamwork out there.
I heard the screams of terror from here, my lord.
Now I'm curious how much damage I could do if I could tote that much non-regulation equipment around.
A perfectly executed operation, glad to have had you aboard.
Excellent, excellent. That couldn't have gone better.
The turrets went out of commission so quickly, we barely suffered any casualties.
Now that that last pocket of resistance is gone, we have complete control of this district. Thank you.
My boys aren't afraid of a few gun batteries; we'll hold their attention as long as it takes.
My lord, a pleasure, have you come to lead the final assault?
Sir, did Command send you to gauge our progress? We're preparing for another assault as we speak.
The smell of fear bring you running, bounty hunter? Good instincts, I could use you.
Welcome to the end of the line, the last stand of the desperate scum hiding in this district.
We've cornered a sizable resistance force, trapped them like rats. I was afraid they'd realize the hopelessness of the situation and surrender, but they're feeling sporting.
It's a stalemate at the moment. They can't escape, but their position is well fortified.
A Sith expects results, Captain, not excuses.
I suggest you fight harder.
We will not fail, my lord. We're just below force to achieving a sweeping victory.
You enjoy giving them just enough hope of escape to make them struggle.
Toying with them sounds fun.
Your approval is a great honor to me, my lord.
I might be available to offer a solution. What are we looking at?
Let's talk business.
You'll find my definition of "well fortified" does not include improvised barricades.
I'll be the judge of that.
I understand, sir. I assure you, if that were all that was standing in our way, we'd already have them.
What's tripping you up?
You have the support of the entire Imperial war machine.
Bring out heavier firepower.
Cleanup operations are low priority for ordnance. Anything bigger than man-portable is being put to use on the front lines.
The resistance has shown remarkable ingenuity. They've cobbled together a number of repeating blaster turrets to block our advance.
We've tried hitting them from several angles, but they've been quick to redeploy their defenses. I could use a hand outmaneuvering them.
Very well.
Do I look like a charity?
Logistics authorized bounty funds for resistance members turned over. This seems like a good use for them.
I need a heavy hitter to flank the resistance position and take out those turrets while my force mounts a direct assault.
They won't dare redeploy the turrets away from our attack, so you won't have to worry about them being turned on you before you can destroy them.
Just handle it. [Refuse quest]
Understood. We'll manage.
The enemy is inventive, I must give them that.
